1.text: Decide what type of tofu to buy.

2.text: Remove the tofu from the package.

3.text: Cut off however many slices of tofu you need.

4.text: Spread the tofu out between two layers of paper towel.

5.text: Place something flat, smooth, and heavy on top of the tofu.

6.text: Leave the tofu for at least 30 minutes.

7.text: Uncover the tofu, then cut it further, if desired.

8.text: Marinate or season the tofu, if desired.

9.text: Sauté firm or extra-firm tofu for a traditional meal.

10.text: Fry firm or extra-firm tofu for a burst of flavor.

11.text: Steam the tofu for a simple, easily-digestible meal.

12.text: Grill extra-firm tofu for a delicious treat.

13.text: Bake extra-firm tofu in the oven for something different.

14.text: Bake thick slices of tofu into steaks.

15.text: Sneak silken tofu into creamy dishes.

16.text: Add it to an existing dish.

17.text: Give a common dish a tofu twist.
